alert.note: Alert for Duval; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 15 at 2:02PM EDT until May 15 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR EASTERN NASSAU AND NORTHEASTERN DUVAL COUNTIES... At 202 PM EDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Oceanway, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
